attributes.action: Immigrants to learn and speak English and to respect the laws and religious and political views of the United Kingdom, and reduce immigrant benefits
attributes.additional_details:
The Home Office must act in the interests of the British public, who are having their culture stripped from them.
 The government must make it a requirement for all current immigrants, those awaiting confirmation of their immigration status and all future immigration applicants to learn and to speak English as their "first" language. The government must also create some form of provision to enforce that all immigrants respect the political and religious views of the United Kingdom.
 The government must also reduce the benefit entitlement of immigrants, and those awaiting their immigration status, or the government must increase the entitlement of ALL United Kingdom citizens to be equal or greater than the benefit entitlement of immigrants or those awaiting their immigration status
